note: Evans Testa Barristers and Solicitors have built their reputation on being accessible to their clients who instruct them in relation to a wide range of legal issues. We offer our clients advice in plain English and approach all legal matters in a manner aimed at achieving our clients the best outcome in a timely and cost-effective manner.
